Package me.agno.gridjavacore.pagination

Class GridPager<T>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.pagination.GridPager<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGridPager<T>
public class GridPager<T> extends Object implements IGridPager<T>
The GridPager class is responsible for managing pagination functionality for a grid.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_MAX_DISPLAYED_PAGES

      public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_DISPLAYED_PAGES
      The maximum number of pages to be displayed in a grid pager.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE

      public static final int DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE
      The DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE variable represents the default page size for pagination. It is an integer constant with a value of 20.

      This variable is defined in the GridPager class and is used in various methods for pagination and generating query strings.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_PAGE_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_PAGE_QUERY_PARAMETER

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_START_INDEX_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_START_INDEX_QUERY_PARAMETER
      The default query parameter used for specifying the start index of a grid pagination. This value is set to "grid-start-index".
      Since:
      GridJavaCore 1.0.0
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_VIRTUALIZED_COUNT_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_VIRTUALIZED_COUNT_QUERY_PARAMETER
      The default query parameter for virtualized count in the grid pagination. This parameter is used to determine the total number of items in a virtualized grid. It is used in conjunction with the IGridPager.getVirtualizedCount() method. The value of this parameter is "grid-virt-count".
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_NO_TOTALS_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_NO_TOTALS_PARAMETER
      The DEFAULT_NO_TOTALS_PARAMETER variable is a constant that represents the query parameter name for "grid-no-totals" in the CustomQueryStringBuilder class. This parameter is used to control whether totals should be included in the grid or not. If the value of this parameter is present and set to "true", totals will be excluded. Usage example: CustomQueryStringBuilder builder = new CustomQueryStringBuilder(query); String queryString = builder.getQueryStringWithParameter(DEFAULT_NO_TOTALS_PARAMETER, "true");
      See Also:
      • GridPager
      • CustomQueryStringBuilder
      • Constant Field Values
